summary: Ming Emperor Chongzhen 1642 CE and General Chaunting plan to defend Kaifeng and prevent the Dynasty's fall. The army faces many problems and an epidemic. Healer Youke treats with a new method found relevant even in today's SARS outbreak.
cast: Yuanzheng Feng|Leon Dai|Bo Feng|Yang Yang|Xuege Qian|Jingwu Ma|Shaoqun Yu
title: Da Ming jie
